server.keepalive_client_description: Maximum period in seconds allowed between communications with the broker. If no other messages are being exchanged, this controls the rate at which the client will send ping messages to the broker.
server.bind_address_client_description: The IP address of a local network interface to bind this client to, assuming multiple interfaces exist
server.websockets_port_description: Port de connexion websockets du serveur.
server.tcp_port_description: Port de connexion tcp au serveur.

server_is_started.description: Commande pour initialiser le client avec le serveur

position_event.description: Commande pour recevoir la position depuis l'optitrack
